name: CraftingInventory
description: The `CraftingInventory` class provides specialized access to Minecraft's crafting table interface, allowing scripts to interact with crafting operations, manage the 3×3 crafting grid, and work with recipes.

methods.name: getInput
methods.description: Retrieves the item stack at the specified coordinates within the 3x3 crafting grid.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X-coordinate of the slot (0-2, where 0 is the leftmost column).

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y-coordinate of the slot (0-2, where 0 is the topmost row).

methods.name: getInput
methods.description: Retrieves the entire 3x3 crafting grid as a 2D array of ItemStackHelper objects, representing the input slots.
